name: U.S. companies introducing new or significantly improved products or processes, by industry sector: 2014–16
description: U.S. companies introducing new or significantly improved products or processes, by industry sector: 2014–16

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_new_or_significantly_improved_products_or_processes_percent_
variableMeasured.description: New Or Significantly Improved Products Or Processes Percent

variableMeasured.name: field_new_or_significantly_improved_products_percent_
variableMeasured.description: New Or Significantly Improved Products Percent

variableMeasured.name: field_new_or_significantly_improved_processes_percent_
variableMeasured.description: New Or Significantly Improved Processes Percent

notes: New or significantly improved products include goods or services. Statistics for the number of companies are based only on companies in the United States responding "Yes" to at least one of the items on the survey relating to new or significantly improved products regardless of whether the company performed or funded R&D. These statistics do not include an adjustment to the weight to account for unit nonresponse.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Science Foundation, and U.S. Census Bureau, Business R&D and Innovation Survey, 2016, Table 64 and Table 65.Science and Engineering Indicators
